reviewText: If you are a watcher of Japanese anime of the ecchi genre the likes of "Maken Ki" & the "Motto To Love" series, then you already know what to expect. You have a main male character who in this case has a female character who is openly in love with him & promised to be his bride at some point because of a bet his & her parents made when the kids were infants basically. They are High School students, not sure the year but I imagine they're prolly Sophmores & Juniors. As in a lot of anime's of this type, the male lives alone because his parents travel abroad a lot so the main girl character moves in with him, since they're gonna be married anyways. Every episode is your daily dose of adolescence immaturity, coming of age & perverted-ness by the male characters as well as some of his female counterparts. Although the male character angered me throughout the series because of his immaturity & acting like a prude with all the girls, the female characters kept me interested & watching to the end. If you've also read the manga, you'll notice he left alot of the story out of the anime which is also the case with a lot of anime adapted from manga's. Furthermore, if you've read the manga & have yet to watch the anime, you probably wanna skip the anime because you'll disappointed at how much was left out. The episodes are only 3 minutes long each which really kinda sucks because each episode ends just as they're starting to get good. The author hasn't posted a new chapter to the anime since earlier this year so i'm not sure if that means the series is done or he's just taking a break. I hope the latter is the case because this story has a lot more action that could happen, I mean it could go on for a while. In the end, I thought it was alright. This is NOT a PG-13 rated series, it should be rated R because it borders on hentai even though nothing sexual actually ever happens between the characters, or at least not yet. There are shots of girls bare breast & butt's though so keep that in mind if you're planning on buying this for someone else...
